description: This file defines a transcription agent that uses OpenAI's GPT-4 model to transcribe an audio file from a specified URL. It imports necessary modules, creates an agent instance with specific tools and model, and prompts the agent to perform transcription.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can perform tasks using specified models and tools.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response or prompt from the agent.
